ComicInfo.Summary:
The prelude to the all new Alley Cat series starring Alley Baggett.
*Notes:* "An Interview with Alley Baggett" five page text piece by Jennifer Hawkins which includes one color photo of Alley Baggett. "Alley Baggett is Alley Cat Issue Number One Special Preview" a five page preview of the upcoming Alley Cat comic.
